zg-card.notes: Layout must be set to "card" and editing needs to be enabled.
Layout must be set to "card" and editing needs to be enabled.

zg-column.notes:
Editing must be enabled to use this feature. 
Built-in validation is applied according to the column type, 
and a custom validator can be specified via `validator`.

zing-grid.notes: Layout must be in card mode to view changes
Headers are there by default, so features that adds headers are not required.

Editing must be enabled to use this feature. 
Built-in validation is applied according to the column type, 
and a custom validator can be specified via `validator`.
